title: Hour 2 - Bob Saget (04-28-20)
itunes:title: Hour 2 - Bob Saget (04-28-20)
description:
Bob Saget let us in to his man cave and shares story's about Richard Pryor and other greats from his early years in comedy. Dan feels very strongly that the Detroit Pistons should not be apologizing for being the Bad Boys.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
